name: Tired (serci98)
description:
STORY

You’re a warrior with an horrible hat and a magic sword that gains power when you rotate it. The Lord Of Darkness is in war with the Lord Of Lightness and sent an ord of tiny red cubes to take over the world. So the Lord Of Lightness gave you the immortality and sent you to fight the ord. But you have not unlimited energy and if you finish it the ord will be able of take over the world.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys to move, mouse down to rotate your sword.

The blue bar at the top of the screen is your energy, don’t run out of energy or you will be tired, you lose energy when you move and when you attack. When you get hit by an enemy you automatically move away from him losing energy.

I made this game entirely while doing my homework for a contest.
